author: elecharny
msg: After a deeper analyze, the error was really an error.
So recommit the fix, but calling Value.getNbBytes instead of Length.getNbBytes
to compute the number of bytes necessary to store an integer as a Value element.

author: elecharny
msg: Added a test to avoid a NPE when having a null string

author: elecharny
msg: Added a static method to compute the length of an integer value.

author: ips
msg: the ResourceId callback now uses the Jakarta Commons-Id lib to generate UUIDs; began to refactor example homes/resources to work with updates made to WSRF home interface
